bug.author: leckie-chn
bug.summary: The document of tf.nn.dynamic_rnn needs to be re-formatted
bug.description: Hi, Someone take a look at the document page of <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/nn/dynamic_rnn>tf.nn.dynamic_rnn</denchmark-link> . I think there are some formatting bugs in the second half of the web page.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dr4b>@dr4b</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wolffg>@wolffg</denchmark-link> : Seems like the empty newlines in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L483>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L483</denchmark-link> are confusing the website generator? Would either of you have some cycles to investigate?

Hy, I was trying to solve this issue, but when I forked the project and download it my source code file is different of the file in the web, it doesn't have the empty newlines that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/asimshankar>@asimshankar</denchmark-link> comments. Can anyone tell me why this is happening?
It has been 14 days with no activity and the awaiting tensorflower label was assigned. Please update the label and/or status accordingly.
